column1: # - action - mandatory. 1- add, 2 - update, 3 - delete, 6- add or update
#  - userId - mandatory, string ID of the user we want to associate with the category
#  - categoryId - mandatory (either this property of categoryReferenceId must be present)
# - categoryReferenceId - optional - either this property of categoryId must be passed.
# - updateMethod - optional - Default value : 1 (AUTOMATIC). Available values: 0 - MANUAL, 1 -AUTOMATIC
# - permissionLevel - optional. Available values: 0- Manager, 1- Moderator, 2 - contributor, 3- categoryMember
# - status - optional. Status of the new categoryUser. Default: PENDING (2). Available values: 1- active, 3- deactivated
